changelog: Added global price view for all items across pawnshops.
Fixed Home tab refresh issue after sales.
Fixed inventory not updating immediately after a sale.
Fixed inconsistent data display on the main page when switching sections.
Changed item setup to reusable 'Product Lists' for pawnshops.
Updated backend to support the new product list system.
Market prices now require a shop ID for specific item display.
Improved currency handling for sales and price calculations.
Reorganized dashboard data handling for consistent updates.
